name: @simracing/desktop
description: SimRacing Coach - Desktop companion app for iRacing with real-time telemetry and coaching
author: SimRacing Coach Team

scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n build,app -c yellow,cyan "tsc -p tsconfig.json -w" "wait-on dist/main.js && electron dist/main.js"
